wikipedia_page.main: Carmen Pieraccini (born 1979) is a Scottish actress, who has appeared in the BBC Scotland soap opera River City since 2003 until her departure in 2007. She returned full-time to the Soap in 2010 and again in 2019 for a short stint. Her other screen appearances include the BBC comedy Dear Green Place (2006–08), and the films Small Faces (1996) and Late Night Shopping (2001).

response: * Carmen Pieraccini (Episodes: Football Crazy & An Eye for an Eye)

A 30th anniversary touring production with a cast comprising Libby McArthur, Mary McCusker, Steven McNicoll, Carmen Pieraccini and Fiona Wood was first performed at the Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy on 6th September 2017.
